```css
// Property: locationAccuracyAuthorization
// Description: A value that indicates the level of location accuracy the app has permission to use.
// Component(s): Ti.Geolocation
'.location-accuracy-authorization-full': { locationAccuracyAuthorization: Ti.Geolocation.ACCURACY_AUTHORIZATION_FULL }
'.location-accuracy-authorization-reduced': { locationAccuracyAuthorization: Ti.Geolocation.ACCURACY_AUTHORIZATION_REDUCED }
```
